scripts.build: node-sass --include-paths node_modules scss --source-map true --output-style compressed --output build/css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace 'build/css/**/*.css' --no-map
scripts.build-docs-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules docs/static/scss --source-map true --output-style compressed --output docs/static/css
scripts.build-docs-site: bundle exec jekyll build --source docs --destination docs/_site
scripts.test: yarn run lint-scss && mdspell docs/**/*.md -r -n -a --en-gb && node -e 'require("./tests/parker").parkerTest()'

devDependenciesComments.vanilla-framework: vanilla-framework is included in devDependencies for use in styling the docs site
devDependenciesComments.pretty-quick: keep pretty-quick on v1, pretty-quick@2 requires version of node that we can't install on jenkins
